# Species Accounts

The following pages contain species accounts for all birds known to have occurred in Brisbane and the adjacent offshore waters. Please see the [Contributing](https://brisbanebirds.com/contributing.html) page for details on how you can help write this atlas.

Species with draft accounts: 9

- [Magpie Goose](https://brisbanebirds.com/magpie-goose-anseranas-semipalmata.html)
- [Pacific Black Duck](https://brisbanebirds.com/pacific-black-duck-anas-superciliosa.html)
- [Eastern Spinebill](https://brisbanebirds.com/eastern-spinebill-acanthorhynchus-tenuirostris.html)
- [Spiny-cheeked Honeyeater](https://brisbanebirds.com/spiny-cheeked-honeyeater-acanthagenys-rufogularis.html)
- [Yellow-rumped Thornbill](https://brisbanebirds.com/yellow-rumped-thornbill-acanthiza-chrysorrhoa.html)
- [Yellow Thornbill](https://brisbanebirds.com/yellow-thornbill-acanthiza-nana.html)
- [Striated Thornbill](https://brisbanebirds.com/striated-thornbill-acanthiza-lineata.html)
- [Brown Thornbill](http://brisbanebirds.com/brown-thornbill-acanthiza-pusilla.html)
- [White-breasted Woodswallow](https://brisbanebirds.com/white-breasted-woodswallow-artamus-leucorynchus.html)
